_source.short_desc: Manage your direct & indirect purchasing on your own private procurement platform. Free version available.
_source.long_desc: Simple Procurement Software to manage all your company's spending. Tradogram provides configurable tools to streamline your Requisitions, Purchase Orders, RFQs/RFPs, Contracts, Receiving and Invoice Matching. Also, manage the process with User Permissions, Approvals, Budgets, Items Catalog, Supplier Management, Projects & much more. The latest cloud technology with top security & performance criteria. Get your FREE account today & see how easy it is to use!
_source.pricing_details:
Free Forever single user account. 

$24/user/month - billed monthly.

$18/user/month - billed annually.

Enterprise Packages are available for 20+ users. Contact us to get a quote!
_source.target_audience: TRADOGRAM is for businesses seeking a cost-effective procurement management solution to streamline their entire purchasing process and gain 100% visibility into their spending.

category_features.name: Buy Side (Suppliers)
category_features.definition: An agreement between a business and an external supplier for the delivery of a set of products or services

category_features.name: Completion Tracking
category_features.definition: Progress indicators towards activity completion

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Contract Lifecycle Management
category_features.definition: Organize, track, and automate the entire contract process

category_features.name: Electronic Signature
category_features.definition: Sign a document within the system

category_features.name: Full Text Search
category_features.definition: Look through entire documents, not just sections

category_features.name: Government Contracts
category_features.definition: Contracts specific to government agencies or organizations who deal with government agencies

category_features.name: Pre-built Templates
category_features.definition: Pre-designed layouts and themes

category_features.name: Sell Side (Customers)
category_features.definition: An agreement between a buyer and a seller for the sale and delivery of goods or services

category_features.name: Specialty Contracts
category_features.definition: An agreement that's only valid if signed by all involved parties, sealed, and delivered

category_features.name: Version Control
category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

category_features.name: Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create, design, and automate processes within the software

category_features.name: 1099 Preparation
category_features.definition: Create and distribute 1099 tax forms to suppliers

category_features.name: Aging Tracking
category_features.definition: Pull a report on unpaid invoices that shows how much time has elapsed since the date of the invoice

category_features.name: Approval Process Control
category_features.definition: Streamline and manage the process of granting permission to the correct parties throughout task progression

category_features.name: Cash Management
category_features.definition: Collection, handling, management and usage of an organization's funds

category_features.name: Check Writing
category_features.definition: Issue payments to third parties via checks

category_features.name: Data Extraction
category_features.definition: Automatically extract information from documents or websites and input it into a database in a specified format

category_features.name: Duplicate Payment Alert
category_features.definition: Receive an automatic notification when the same exact payment is about to be initiated for the second time

category_features.name: Electronic Funds Transfer
category_features.definition: Transfer money electronically between two bank accounts

category_features.name: Fraud Detection
category_features.definition: Identify and prevent suspicious activity

category_features.name: Invoice Processing
category_features.definition: Create, process, execute and manage suppliers invoices till the payment is made

category_features.name: PO Reconciliation
category_features.definition: Verify that invoices comply to the terms of pre-issued purchase orders prior to issuing payments

category_features.name: Recurring Payments
category_features.definition: Automate supplier payments on a predetermined schedule (monthly, quarterly, etc)

category_features.name: Vendor Management
category_features.definition: Ability to track and store all vendor-related information, such as contacts, services offered, terms, etc.

category_features.name: "What If" Scenarios
category_features.definition: A type of technique planning that allows businesses to input hypothetical variables in order to simulate potential outcomes

category_features.name: Asset Lifecycle Management
category_features.definition: Manage, prioritize and plan for capital expenses

category_features.name: Cash Management
category_features.definition: Collection, handling, management and usage of an organization's funds

category_features.name: Consolidation/Roll-Up
category_features.definition: Combine and merge loans, assets, liabilities, and other financial data and items into one entity for reporting purposes

category_features.name: Expense Management
category_features.definition: Plan, pay and track business related expenses.

category_features.name: Forecasting
category_features.definition: Form predictions based on past and present data/trends

category_features.name: General Ledger
category_features.definition: Centralized accounting record which tracks all financial transactions

category_features.name: Income & Balance Sheet
category_features.definition: A statement detailing the financial position of a business including assets, liabilities, and equity at a certain point in time

category_features.name: Multi-Company
category_features.definition: Manage the accounting and financial aspects of multiple locations or companies in a single location

category_features.name: Multi-Department/Project
category_features.definition: Manage the accounting and financial aspects of multiple operations and departments or ongoing projects from a single location

category_features.name: Profit/Loss Statement
category_features.definition: A type of financial statement used to record and report an organization?s revenues, costs, and expenses over a specific amount of time

category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Business Process Automation
category_features.definition: Improve the management of information, tasks, and procedures by establishing routines and patterns associated with processes

category_features.name: Business Process Control
category_features.definition: Define and maintain business rules that determine workflow capabilities and criteria

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: No-Code
category_features.definition: Drag and drop/visual interfaces that allow non-tech users to build without writing code

category_features.name: Process Change Tracking
category_features.definition: Document any changes or proposed changes made to business processes or workflows

category_features.name: Process Modeling & Designing
category_features.definition: Visually identify, define, and map all details and relationships surrounding business process models and elements

category_features.name: Process Modeling & Designing
category_features.definition: Visual tools to allow users to design business process models with a focus on developing improvements for optimized processes

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Templates
category_features.definition: Sample files or documents that could be customized as needed or used as is

category_features.name: Approval Process Control
category_features.definition: Streamline and manage the process of granting permission to the correct parties throughout task progression

category_features.name: Corporate Card
category_features.definition: Manage and track credit cards that are distributed to employees to use for authorized business expenses

category_features.definition: Scan and upload receipts to a central database using a mobile device

category_features.name: Multi-Currency
category_features.definition: Manage and handle various international currencies

category_features.definition: Upload, track, and submit receipts in a central database

category_features.definition: Measure time to completion or hours worked

category_features.definition: Create, design, and automate processes within the software

category_features.name: Backorder Management
category_features.definition: Management of order that cannot be filled when presented, and for which the customer is prepared to wait for some time

category_features.definition: Create and manage digital catalog of products/services with their details, specification, and price

category_features.definition: Add customized logos and colors to the interface

category_features.name: Discount Management

category_features.name: Pricing Management
category_features.definition: Develop, set, execute and measure prices as an ongoing process

category_features.name: Quotes/Estimates

category_features.definition: Improve business process by accessing more features and applications by combining third party integrations

related_products.short_desc: Adobe Acrobat Sign helps teams manage contract lifecycles by reducing errors and manual work which saves them time and money.
related_products.features: Adobe Acrobat Sign helps teams manage contract lifecycles by reducing errors and manual work which saves them time and money. Acrobat Sign offers tools to assist with contract management like workflows to automate agreements, templates to reduce mistakes, and user group management for clean assignment and permissions. It integrates seamlessly with Workday, Salesforce, and Microsoft so employees can continue to work in systems they already use.

related_products.short_desc: Build, track, and eSign your docs all in one place using legally binding online signatures.
related_products.features: PandaDoc streamlines contract management from the sale all the way through contract execution and renewal. Built-in collaboration, version control, document history, and electronic signature make it easier than ever to draft, negotiate, and sign contracts.

related_products.short_desc:
Everything you need to manage contracts, clients, proposals, contracts, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
related_products.features:
Contract management for independent professionals-that's HoneyBook.

HoneyBook makes it easy to manage contracts, book clients, streamline projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

related_products.short_desc: Save time recording bills, scanning contracts, and approving documents. Avoid risks, go paperless, and increase ROI with Odoo Sign.
related_products.features: Improve hiring processes, reduce sales cycles, and keep track of all contracts, with Odoo?s easy-to-use, fully integrated eSignature solution. Odoo Sign is a fast, convenient way to send, sign, and approve documents. Users can quickly prepare clean, polished contracts by simply dragging & dropping blocks to be completed by the parties involved, submit signature requests in just seconds, carefully track the status of sent contracts, and upload important PDF files with ease - thanks to Odoo Sign.

related_products.short_desc: Online ITSM Service Desk with Incident, Problem, Change, Release & Asset Management, in addition to powerful ticketing & automation
related_products.features: Freshservice is an intelligent, right-sized ITSM solution that delivers exceptional employee experiences with an intuitive, scalable, no-code solution. With its state-of-the-art AI and ML capabilities, Freshservice helps organizations ease an IT agents workload and improve their productivity by automating mundane tasks. In addition to its AI capabilities, Freshservice is flexible and scalable enough to be used by both: companies relying on legacy systems and modern enterprises.

related_products.short_desc: #1 Adobe? Acrobat? alternative: PDFelement is your all-in-one PDF solution. Create, edit, convert, and sign PDF files in a better way.
related_products.features:
PDFelement is the easiest way to create, edit, convert and sign PDF documents on Windows and Mac. This alternative to Adobe Acrobat offers enterprise-grade PDF functionalities and perpetual licensing. 

Sold globally in 9 different languages, PDFelement is the all-in-one PDF solution for users of all types, and the only complete PDF solution next to Adobe Acrobat available on Windows, Mac, iOS, & Android.

related_products.short_desc: Jira Service Management is an ITSM software that unlocks high-velocity teams to deliver great service experiences fast and together.
related_products.features: Jira Service Management is an ITSM solution that unlocks high-velocity IT, dev, operations, and business teams. Empowered teams can deliver great service experiences, without the complexity of traditional ITSM, and coordinate efforts for even more impact through Jira's open collaborative platform. Streamlined workflows, automation rules, queues, SLAs, and a self-service portal all empower IT, dev, operations, and business teams to deliver exceptional service management at scale with no silos.

related_products.short_desc: Proposify's the proposal software that gives you control and visibility into the most important stage of your sales process. The close.
related_products.features:
Proposify is the online proposal software that gives control and visibility into the most important stage of your sales process. From deal design to sign-off, get the confidence and flexibility to manage and close all your quotes, contracts, and proposals.

Create impressive sales documents that stay consistent and error-free. Receive the insights to scale your process, make timely engagements, and accurately forecast. And deliver a seamless sign-off experience for your customers and prospects.

related_products.short_desc: Quickbase is a secure, compliant and easily governed no-code platform that enables you to track/manage everything for your contracting.
related_products.features: Quickbase empowers enterprise organizations to quickly turn ideas into applications that make them more efficient, informed, and productive. Quickbase is a secure, compliant and easily governed platform that enables you to track and manage everything you need for your contracts. Gain transparency, improve the resiliency of your supply chain, make better decisions, and gain new levels of efficiency by unlocking data stuck in your core systems. Ensure ongoing agility with no-code applications.

related_products.short_desc: Concord is the simplest way to collaborate on, sign, manage, and store agreements.
related_products.features:
Concord is the only tool you need for all your contracts. Spend less time juggling between applications, editors, and e-signature tools and save money. 
Over 500,000+ companies trust Concord with their contracts. 
With Concord, you can: draft, negotiate, sign, and manage every contract across your organization  all in one place; work the way you want  on Concord, Word, or Google Docs; collaborate with everyone  your teams, customers, and vendors. Get started in minutes, not months.

related_products.short_desc: Web based software that empowers businesses to negotiate, create, track, sign, and manage contracts from any device.
related_products.features: Better Proposals is an intuitive, web based contract management solution. Streamline your entire sales process with modern, on-brand digital documents and automate contract generation. Say goodbye to using multiple platforms thanks to its integrations, tracking, analytics, and legally binding eSignatures.

similar_products.short_desc: ContractSafe helps companies to better organize signed contracts and avoid missing key dates without spending a lot of time or money.
similar_products.features: We organize your contracts easily and affordably!  Incredibly easy to use and manage.  Search and find any document (even scans) in seconds.  AI pulls key info for setup. Email reminders so you'll never forget to renew (or cancel) an important contract.  Collaborate with your whole team-with unlimited users.  No implementation or configuration means you will be up and running right away.  Find out why our customers call us "disruptive" and "a miracle product," and give us five star ratings!

similar_products.short_desc: User-friendly contract software with AI and easy setup. Pricing starts at $59/month/user. Thousands of users worldwide
similar_products.features: CobbleStone Contract Insight Contract Management Software is an Enterprise CLM system selected by thousands of contract admin, legal, and procurement professionals. Contract Insight is backed by artificial intelligence and can automate and streamline the entire contract lifecycle with user-friendly features and administration. Take the stress out of contracts with CobbleStone.  Hosted/SaaS & Deployed options. Starting @ $59/month/user, click to learn more.

similar_products.short_desc: The most flexible, powerful contract platform to modernize the way you contract manage - from Drafting to Negotiating to Tracking.
similar_products.features: Want to generate contracts 75% faster? Outlaw is the most flexible, easiest-to-use contract management platform. While staying compliant, teams can turn a 5-step agreement process down to just 2. Ingest buy-side contracts, redlines and all, to keep all parties on the same page. Track and store documents in our intelligent contract repository. Draft, negotiate and eSign in real-time. Integrate Outlaw seamlessly with your existing workflow and business tools.

similar_products.short_desc: ContractWorks is easy-to-use contract management software with quick implementation, low, transparent pricing, and 24/7 support.
similar_products.features: ContractWorks contract management software makes executing, storing, and tracking corporate agreements easier. With quick implementation, an easy-to-use interface, and low, transparent pricing starting at $600/month for unlimited users, ContractWorks makes contract management software accessible to businesses of all sizes. In addition to these features, you get a dedicated support team to help your business get the most out of your contract portfolio.

similar_products.short_desc: Juro is the all-in-one contract automation platform that empowers legal and business teams to streamline contract workflow.
similar_products.features:
Juro is the all-in-one contract automation platform that empowers legal and business teams to create, approve, eSign, track and manage their contracts in one unified workspace. 

Spend less time working across multiple tools and enable your team to close contracts faster with self-serve automation, collaborative workflows and a data-rich repository.

5,000+ companies of all sizes use Juro to spend 75% less time on manual contract work and close contracts 30% faster.

similar_products.short_desc: A simple to use, powerful, cloud-based Contract Management Solution with AI & automation at its centre. Choose a better way today.
similar_products.features:
A simple to use, powerful, AI driven cloud-based Contract Management solution. Centralise contracts for increased visibility, automate & standardise internal processes, monitor risk & manage workload. 

Enjoy unlimited users, unlimited integrated electronic signatures & automation tools, including patent-pending Touchless Contracts technology. 

Say goodbye to Excel & other outdated software solutions- say hello to powerful, cost effective CLM that integrates with your existing tech-stack.

similar_products.short_desc: ContractNow is a simple, powerful contract management solution with unlimited users, storage & electronic signatures.
similar_products.features:
ContractNow is a simple, powerful contract management solution specifically designed to help businesses gain clarity and control over their contract agreements.

Centralise all your contract data and documentation, extract key information & clause language and sign all new contracts using ContractNow's integrated eSign feature.

Gain total visibility over your business's contracts and create a stable platform for future growth.

similar_products.short_desc: - #1 Leading No Code Platform - Automate and fast-track your entire contract lifecycle process from creation to amendment/renewal.
similar_products.features:
- #1 Leading No Code Platform - Automate and fast-track your entire contract lifecycle process by automating and streamlining the contract-creation process, from information gathering, negotiation, approvals, e-signature, and obligations.

Generate contracts in a matter of minutes and facilitate the negotiation & signing process with automated workflows & redlining functionality. Gain instant visibility into contract and approval statuses, and stay up to date with automated alerts.

similar_products.short_desc: Windward is a low-code document solution for MS Office users who want to streamline the creation and output of any data-based documents
similar_products.features: Windward is the global leader in document generation solutions. Our unique, low-code solution embeds into any application and enables users to design custom, logic-based templates within the familiar landscape of Microsoft Office. Windward is fast, easy, and removes human error, transforming the way business professionals create documents.

similar_products.short_desc: Icertis is the only contract intelligence platform you can trust to keep your business out in front, now and into the future.
similar_products.features: The AI-powered, analyst-validated Icertis Contract Intelligence (ICI) platform turns contracts from static documents into strategic advantage by structuring and connecting the critical contract information that defines how an organization runs. Today, the worlds most iconic brands and disruptive innovators trust Icertis to fully realize the intent of their combined 7.5 million+ contracts worth more than $1 trillion, in 40+ languages and 90+ countries.

similar_products.short_desc: Jira Service Management is an ITSM software that unlocks high-velocity teams to deliver great service experiences fast and together.
similar_products.features: Jira Service Management is an ITSM solution that unlocks high-velocity IT, dev, operations, and business teams. Empowered teams can deliver great service experiences, without the complexity of traditional ITSM, and coordinate efforts for even more impact through Jira's open collaborative platform. Streamlined workflows, automation rules, queues, SLAs, and a self-service portal all empower IT, dev, operations, and business teams to deliver exceptional service management at scale with no silos.

similar_products.short_desc: Conga contracting products help automate and simplify contract management within your organization.
similar_products.features:
Conga empowers you to tackle and manage contracting processes with ease. If you're just dipping your toes into contracting or want to improve a mature contract management process, Conga has you covered. Our contract solutions help you automate key contracting processes to give your business faster cycle times, lower risk, and happier customers.

Conga provides proven contract management solutions that fit your business needs.

similar_products.short_desc: With over a decade of experience, our data-driven software provides an intuitive, powerful and flexible contract management experience.
similar_products.features: Contract Logix is a longtime leader and provider of intelligent and data-driven contract lifecycle management software. The company's software empowers legal, administration, IT, procurement, finance, and sales professionals across dozens of industries to digitally draft, negotiate, approve, execute, and manage their contracts. Hundreds of brands have partnered with Contract Logix to automate their contracting processes while minimizing risk, increasing compliance, and driving profitability.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Document Management software automates the process of managing documents from creation to storage to distribution throughout an enterprise, increasing efficiency and reducing the cost and clutter of maintaining paper records. Document Management applications provide solutions for a wide range of document needs from low specificity, high volume items such as standard forms to highly specific, low volume items such as one-to-one correspondence. Document Management software is related to Digital IT Asset Management software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Forms Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Forms Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Forms Automation software gives companies the ability to streamline document workflows. These solutions optimize document creation, printing, faxing, merging, security, and inbound/outbound document traffic. Companies can create and manage nearly any kind of document, from invoices to incident reports, and can easily track collected information. Forms Automation software is relevant to most industries and is related to Business Process Management software, Content Management software, Contract Management software, and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Proposal Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Proposal Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Proposal Management software helps companies manage the proposal and RFP process. Bidders may quickly create strong business proposals and responses to RFPs that are tailored to the needs of each proposal. This software is helpful in automating the more cumbersome aspects of proposal writing while maintaining a detailed and professional-looking document. Some Proposal Management software is also a good fit for companies that are soliciting proposals. In this case, the software helps to organize and evaluate various aspects of multiple proposals at once. Proposal Management software is related to Quoting software, Contract Management software, and Professional Services Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Quoting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Quoting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Quoting software enables organizations to accurately calculate cost and price estimates quickly and efficiently. Quote Management applications also allow enterprise-wide distribution of quotes, enabling automatic pricing based on historical records as well as easy integration of localized factors, including customer profiles, case-specific terminology and sales tax rates. Many Quoting applications integrate directly with an organization's accounting activities, enabling the automatic conversion of price quotes to invoices. Quoting software is related to Accounting software and Sales Force Automation software.

category_features.definition: Manage various aspects of the relationship with suppliers (e.g. interactions, history)

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Approval Workflow
category_features.definition: Route documents and other data through one or more stakeholders for review and approval

category_features.name: Budgeting/Forecasting
category_features.definition: Estimate trends and allocate funds for future spend within a specific time period

category_features.name: Expense Tracking
category_features.definition: Detailed log and record of costs

category_features.name: Multi-Currency
category_features.definition: Manage and handle various international currencies

category_features.name: Prepaid Cards
category_features.definition: Bank cards with approved funds pre-loaded that employees can use for corporate purchases

category_features.name: Procurement Management
category_features.definition: Organize and manage all processes/procedures involved in purchasing goods and/or services

category_features.name: Receipt Management
category_features.definition: Upload, track, and submit receipts in a central database

category_features.name: Spend Analysis
category_features.definition: Review and uncover trends in spending activity

category_features.name: Spend Control
category_features.definition: Set allowances and ensure employees don't spend more than the allotted amounts

category_features.name: Supplier Management
category_features.definition: Manage various aspects of the relationship with suppliers (e.g. interactions, history)

category_features.name: Audit Trail
category_features.definition: Track changes and view date/time records

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Offboarding
category_features.definition: Closing out contracts by reviewing contract/project completion, finalizing payments, and ensuring terms and compliance as been achieved

category_features.name: Performance Metrics
category_features.definition: A set of indicators that tracks how well an organization, a division, or a particular project are performing

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Sourcing Management
category_features.definition: Negotiate best prices and choose the right vendor for various purchases

category_features.name: Transaction History
category_features.definition: Record of all transactions, including information on purchase orders, purchases, payments, etc.

category_features.name: Vendor Payment
category_features.definition: Finalize payment to vendor(s) for goods/services received if details on invoice matches the purchase order

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks Commerce enables you to manage inventory and orders for your multichannel business and keep track of products.
related_products.features:
QuickBooks Commerce enables you to manage inventory and orders for your multichannel business and keep track of your products as you sell and restock across multiple warehouse locations and channels. 

QuickBooks Commerce allows brands to automate and integrate their commerce platforms and get powerful insights into all their sales data on-demand.

related_products.short_desc: Simple, easy-to-use accounting software to help you manage your business finance in a smart way!
related_products.features: Use Zoho Books to create and send detailed and customized purchase orders with your own branding. Track opened purchase orders and convert POs to bills.

related_products.short_desc: 360+ 4.7/5 reviews. Simple yet, fully featured. The highest rated purchasing software.
related_products.features: Simple Purchasing software that allows team members to create purchase requests on the go that can get approved by pre-defined approvers - from any device. All relevant comments & docs can get attached to the PO & managed for reporting & auditing. Eliminate spending mistakes & keep team members accountable for company card purchasing. View and manage budgets in real-time for insightful decision-making for each purchase. Draw accurate reports with a click of a button for the accountant.

related_products.short_desc: Automate and integrate your processes to gain full control and visibility of your purchasing process with Pipefy.
related_products.features:
Gain full control and visibility of your purchasing process with Pipefy.

The process management platform helps you ensure requisitions and purchase orders are being processed quickly and accurately, and allows you to integrate your accounting software or other legacy tools to scale your operation. 

Build an error-proof operation with digital workflows that reduce the risk of human error. Try Pipefy for free.

related_products.short_desc: Cin7 Orderhive is the ultimate automated eCommerce order management, and inventory management software for retailers and wholesalers.
related_products.features: Cin7 Orderhive is order, shipping, and inventory management software for online retailers and marketplace sellers. Automate, track, and manage your orders from the 16 most popular marketplaces, and 9 most popular online stores like Shopify, WooCommerce, etc. Easily set automation rules to efficiently process 10 to 1000s of orders per day including automated, integrated shipping, fulfillment, 3PLs, and drop shipping.

related_products.short_desc: Spendwise is an affordable easy-to-use online system that helps you control spending saving you time and money.
related_products.features: Spendwise is an affordable easy-to-use online system that helps you control spending saving you time and money.  Users can create purchase orders, submit them for approval, approve or reject them, and send them directly to vendors.  Users can also keep track of items and bills received from vendors.  Spendwise is web-based so you don't have to install software and you can access it from anywhere.  Visit our website for more information and sign up for a Free Trial and/or Demo!

related_products.short_desc: Centralize and control purchasing process. Structured approvals, Amazon Punch-in, budgeting, unified items catalogs, and more.
related_products.features: Manage purchasing process and access real-time reports. Precoro helps you streamline approval workflow, match invoices with orders and receipts, set up rules for cost centers or budgets, purchase directly from Amazon Business, and control stock. Add attachments and notes whenever you need them. Precoro is easy to use and implement. Get access to a 14-days free trial to ensure we're the perfect fit for your business.

related_products.short_desc: Deploy personalized procure-to-pay workflows that empower your teams to purchase what they need, when they need it.
related_products.features: Speed up purchasing and empower teams to buy what they need, when they need it, without the bottlenecks. The Procurify Platform brings all your purchasing needs together in one easy-to-use platform that fully integrates with your existing accounting systems. Maximize operational efficiency and increase spend visibility and control with comprehensive procure-to-pay workflows, 3-way matching, and custom approvals.

related_products.short_desc: Streamline and secure your company's purchasing process with multi-tier approval and automated 3-way line item matching.
related_products.features: Lightyear's class-leading platform brings purchasing visibility to your business from computer, tablet or mobile. Control who can order what, increase the speed of approvals, bring spending under control & reduce the potential for fraud with our Purchase Order (PO) workflow and approvals matrix. Automate and streamline bill to PO matching with automated 3-way matching at a line-item level.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based tool that helps businesses manage order fulfillment & inventory processes across online sales channels.
related_products.features:
Ecomdash is an inventory management and order fulfillment software company that gives you the option of managing all your online sales channels from one dashboard. Coordinate sales and stock levels on platforms such as eBay, Amazon, Etsy, and more with reporting and auto-synchronizing. 

The software is ideal for small to medium sized companies and comes with a free 15-day trial and free onboarding session for new, active users. All ecomdash customers also receive a free Pitney Bowes account.

related_products.short_desc: Open source solution for all around business management from customers and orders to invoicing and inventory.
related_products.features: Open source solution for all around business management: Sales, Invoicing, Agenda, Stock, Purchase Orders, Emailing, Accounting, Expense report, Leave requests. Several hundreds of modules are available according to your need.

similar_products.short_desc: Deploy personalized procure-to-pay workflows that empower your teams to purchase what they need, when they need it.
similar_products.features: Speed up purchasing and empower teams to buy what they need, when they need it, without the bottlenecks. The Procurify Platform brings all your purchasing needs together in one easy-to-use platform that fully integrates with your existing accounting systems. Maximize operational efficiency and increase spend visibility and control with comprehensive procure-to-pay workflows, 3-way matching, and custom approvals.

All relevant comments & docs can get attached to the PO & managed for reporting & auditing. Eliminate spending mistakes & keep team members accountable for company card purchasing. View and manage budgets in real-time for insightful decision-making for each purchase. Draw accurate reports with a click of a button for the accountant.

similar_products.short_desc: Simplify your purchasing by centralizing it onto 1 platform with the proper guardrails in place to ensure compliance and cost savings.
similar_products.features: Order simplifies buying for businesses by centralizing it onto one platform. With Order, all the products your company needs to operate can be found in one place with the approval and budgeting guardrails needed to ensure compliance. Placing recurring orders is as simple as one click with saved product lists, and saving on purchases hasn't been easier with Order's $4 billion in purchasing power and strategic sourcing that ensures you always pay the lowest prices for your products.

similar_products.short_desc: The smart & powerful Proactis purchasing solution drives cost savings & efficiency while simplifying processes & improving visibility.
similar_products.features: Work faster & easier by automating purchasing with the Proactis cloud-based spend management platform. Eliminate time-consuming manual processes. Realize quick cost savings, spend control & visibility. Experience simple & quick approvals, easy analysis & greater visibility to all procurement & finance functions in a simple yet powerful platform. Realize improved productivity, speed & transparency. Trusted by 3M+ users worldwide, Proactis integrates with the top ERP systems. Book a free demo now.

similar_products.short_desc: Best-in-class purchasing solution for effective spend management, complete transparency, insights and compliance.
similar_products.features: Replace manual, time consuming processes, and spreadsheets with automated purchase requisitioning, PO, expense and approval workflows, spend analytics, and reporting power. Save time and costs with smarter spending processes, that are informed, in budget, and policy compliant. Integrated with your ERP / accounting system or standalone, Fraxion's easy to use system drives efficiencies throughout the purchase-to-pay process.

similar_products.short_desc: A web-based purchasing software that offers the ability to create, view, and approve POs, track deliveries and approve invoices.
similar_products.features:
This cloud-based purchasing software is an award winning solution, simplifying the purchase workflow and offering the complete cycle starting from the creation of POs, their customized approval, track receiving and matching+approval of invoices.

DPOs advanced user interface is easy to use and available 24/7. It works with multiple languages and currencies and is also available through mobile apps. Our clients have more than 200 options to customize their settings the way they want.

similar_products.short_desc: Teampay's intuitive purchasing software automates and simplifies all purchases from end to end. Connect using Slack and Teams
similar_products.features: Get ahead of your company's spend with automated upfront controls that make everyone's job easier. Teampay's proactive approach makes it easy for employees to code transactions as they happen, providing the most up-to-date purchase data with transactions that are automatically reconciled to your accounting software. Save your entire company time and empower your employees with easy-to-follow workflows that ensure they're spending in policy for every purchase, every time.

similar_products.short_desc: Kissflow brings you the #1 Procurement cloud solution which is flexible and has purchasing to vendor management, all in one platform.
similar_products.features: Kissflow Procurement Cloud is the #1 flexible procurement solutions which has everything from purchasing to vendor management, all in one platform. It has all everything include Purchase Orders, Purchase Requisition, Vendor Management, Purchase Invoicing, Analytics, and Integrations.

similar_products.short_desc: Expeni.com is a low-priced, simple and easy to use purchase order management system. Best fit for a small budget!
similar_products.features: Low-priced, simple and easy to use! With one-click approval process, Expeni.com simplifies the Purchase Order management process. Setup budgets. Employees can issue purchase orders quickly, attach invoices etc. Automatic email notifications notify approvers. Managers can approve from anywhere. Setup muti-level approval. Finance can add payments. Export CSV or PDF. Share with suppliers. Customize PO form. Control PO access between departments and branch locations. Manage suppliers and products.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting software automates an organization's financial functions and transactions with modules including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, billing and general ledger. Integration of Accounting applications allows for comprehensive, real-time, on-demand analysis of an organization's financial status. Toolsets within Accounting solutions can often be customized to the specific needs of an organization. Accounting software is related to Audit software, Billing and Invoicing software, Compliance software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contract Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contract Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contract Management software automates the creation, tracking, and monitoring of contracts and agreements. Contract Management software also allows for the company-wide sharing of contract documents and management of differing document versions. These contract management applications often provide top-down control and monitoring of contract status, key dates, and personnel responsibilities. Contract Management software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Procurement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Procurement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Procurement software automates the purchasing process and manages all activities related to an organization's expenditures. Procurement applications automate the process of resource acquisition and supplier relationship management. Employees can easily create purchase orders subject to review and approval by managers. Managers have a broad range tools at their disposal for tracking, analysis and reporting on business process efficiency. Procurement software is related to Billing and Invoicing software, Purchasing software and Vendor Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Spend Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Spend Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Spend Management software helps companies track and report on actual expenditures as well as control these expenditures through tools that limit amounts that can be spent by employees.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Vendor Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Vendor Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Vendor Management software helps manage costs, track progress, and report on relationship and product quality of third-party vendors. When an organization uses multiple vendors, Vendor Management software can enhance productivity and collaboration of the vendor projects. This type of software often includes information databasing, vendor scoring, RFP and bidding functionality, and performance tracking. Vendor Management software is related to Contract Management software, Proposal Management software, Procurement software, and Purchasing software.
